src:
Cetak Gol Lagi, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain Kian Pede di Liverpool
06 Nov 2019, 15:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah pengakuan dibuat oleh Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain setelah pertandingan melawan Genk dini hari tadi. Sang gelandang mengaku kondisinya saat ini sudah semakin membaik dan ia percaya diri bisa berkontribusi lebih banyak bagi Liverpool.
Setelah melewati cedera yang parah, Chamberlain mulai aktif terlibat di skuat Liverpool. Meski belum menjadi starter yang rutin, namun Jurgen Klopp secara perlahan mulai menambah porsi bermainnya.
Dini hari tadi, Chamberlain kembali memberikan kontribusi besar bagi Liverpool. Ia mencetak gol kedua The Reds sehingga mereka menang dengan skor 2-1 atas sang tamu, Genk.
Chamberlain mengaku senang performanya kian membaik dari hari ke hari. "Saya merasa permainan saya semakin membaik di setiap pertandingan yang saya mainkan," ujar Chamberlain yang dikutip Goal International.

Baca komentar lengkap sang gelandang di bawah ini.
text:
Scoring Again, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain Kian Pede at Liverpool
Nov 6 2019, 15:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A confession was made by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain after the match against Genk this morning. The midfielder admitted his condition is now getting better and he believes he can contribute more to Liverpool.
After passing through a severe injury, Chamberlain began actively involved in the Liverpool squad. Although not yet a regular starter, Jurgen Klopp slowly began to increase his playing portion.
Earlier today, Chamberlain made another major contribution to Liverpool. He scored the Reds' second goal so they won with a score of 2-1 over the guest, Genk.
Chamberlain said he was happy that his performance had improved from day to day. "I feel my game is getting better in every game that I play," Chamberlain was quoted as saying by Goal International.

Read the midfielder's full comments below.
